snippet: Ronald Haskell, 33, was related to the victims, and the shootings are being considered part of a domestic dispute.
abstract: Ronald Haskell is being held on six counts of murder after police say he shot four children and two adults inside house in Spring, Tex, as part of domestic dispute; police say Haskell is a former in-law of one of the adults killed and that he had come to Spring to demand information about location of his ex-wife.
lead_paragraph: Ronald Haskell, 33, was related to the victims, and the shootings are being considered part of a domestic dispute.

headline.main: Man Being Held in Killing of Six in Houston
headline.print_headline: Texas: Former In-Law Accused of Killing 6 in Family
